LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.0.label: 憂慮
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.1.label: 深度恐懼
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.1.descriptio: 我真的很緊張... 不知道什麼原因.
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.2.label: 不可名狀的恐怖
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.3.label: 極度恐慌
LanguageData.HallucinogenThoughts.stages.3.descriptio: 眾神在上啊！恐懼正在吞噬我！
